div.p: A district email was sent out April 4th with information regarding our distance learning program and the informative web broadcast on April 5th. You can access those links on this website as well. If you did not receive that email and/or you need to update your default email address, please email:

h3.a: Congratuations Cashion Elementary GE Model School

p.strong: Cashion Elementary School on our prestigious designation as a GE Model School! Our school will now be held up as an exemplary school at which others can learn to be more effective educators. Our faculty and staff have worked hard to obtain this honor and we are proud to recognize this level of achievement.. Cashion Elementary School demonstrates academic excellence and a climate of mutual respect!

a.aria-label: Read more about Congratuations Cashion Elementary GE Model School
